name: Glitch Has Joined the Game
description:
GameJam:

A Game Featuring "Has Joined the Game" game series. 

- Gravity Has Joined the Game

Where you play a plat former game in a peaceful level, and it happened something called Gli#tch want's to play with you.

- Use Arrow Key to Move
- C to Jump, Hold for higher Jump

The Game is a bit short, and obviously contains some bug. I mean, that's how it is supposed to be played.
Please report any correctly functioning features. Those are not meant to be that way. However:

SPOILER: ALL BUGS ARE INTENDED


Level Asset Credit goes to : Unity.AssetStore Free asset
-_ H#VE FVN />
